pkgmetadata.longdescription: Predicting Ethnic Group from Names // Implementation of the race/ethnicity prediction method, described in "rethnicity: An R package for predicting ethnicity from names" by Fangzhou Xie (2022) doi:10.1016/j.softx.2021.100965 and "Rethnicity: Predicting Ethnicity from Names" by Fangzhou Xie (2021) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2109.09228.
